tech_news.title: Qualcomm reveals its not-so-elite Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 - The Verge
tech_news.description: The first Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 phones will come from OnePlus, Motorola, and Vivo within weeks.

tech_news.title: Nintendo Expands Switch Online's NES And Game Boy Library With Four More Titles - Nintendo Life
Early Black Friday Deals Today: Gaming Deals Across Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 and Xbox - IGN
tech_news.description: Early Black Friday deals are live with big discounts on PS5, Nintendo Switch/Switch 2 and Xbox games, hardware and accessories. Plus Walmart tech bargains, $25 Pokémon plushies and huge streaming service offers.

tech_news.title: Modder who first put Thomas the Tank Engine into Skyrim flips the bird at the lawyers, does it again in Morrowind: "I fundamentally do not view toy company CEOs or media CEOs as people" - GamesRadar+
tech_news.description: "I sometimes feel like I need to milk a particular joke until its inevitable demise"

tech_news.title: Apple Quietly Liquidates Millions of Mac Mini M4 on Amazon, Compact Desktop Now Selling for Pennies - kotaku.com

tech_news.title: Spiking memory prices mean that it is once again a horrible time to build a PC - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: Some RAM kits are over three times as expensive as they were three months ago.

tech_news.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.

tech_news.title: This AirTag competitor I found has a useful security feature, works with Android, and budget friendly - ZDNET
tech_news.description: Pebblebee's Clip 5 finder tag attaches to a key ring, works with iOS and Android, and makes a loud sound. It's on sale for Black Friday.
